New Records: England ended its five-match losing streak at the men's Cricket World Cup
Key Match Events: Ben Stokes hit an 84-ball 108 for his first World Cup ton
Dawid Malan (87) and Chris Woakes (51) smashed half-centuries
England added 124 in the last 10 overs to finish strongly
Pre-Game Insights: England is now seventh on the World Cup standings
The Netherlands is still in the hunt for a Champions Trophy spot
Post-Match Reflections: Stokes said 'I'm more pleased for us to get a victory, to be honest.'
Stokes was named player of the match
Miscellaneous Highlights: Glenn Maxwell's stunning match-winning double century has been hailed as the greatest ODI innings of all time
England's win lifted them off the bottom to seventh in the 10-team standings with four points
Others: England face unbeaten India next in Bengaluru
